Body:
"""
        Test that the client can modify an attribute.
        """
request_payload = payloads.ModifyAttributeRequestPayload(unique_identifier=
    '1', new_attribute=obj.NewAttribute(attribute=primitives.Boolean(value=
    True, tag=enums.Tags.SENSITIVE)))
response_payload = payloads.ModifyAttributeResponsePayload(unique_identifier
    ='1')
with ProxyKmipClient() as client:
    client.proxy.send_request_payload.return_value = response_payload
    unique_identifier, attribute = client.modify_attribute(unique_identifier
        ='1', new_attribute=obj.NewAttribute(attribute=primitives.Boolean(
        value=True, tag=enums.Tags.SENSITIVE)))
    args = enums.Operation.MODIFY_ATTRIBUTE, request_payload
    client.proxy.send_request_payload.assert_called_with(*args)
    self.assertEqual('1', unique_identifier)
    self.assertIsNone(attribute)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
